name: Oceans: Legends of the Deep
description:
Legends of the Deep brings mythology to the Oceans ecosystem.

Oceans is a journey into the unknown, where you discover powerful traits that hardly seem possible in the realm of biology, and yet they turn out to be real. With Legends of the Deep, you will discover things beyond the realm of science - entire empires of mythic proportions!

Game Play
At the beginning of the game, deal 4 Empire cards to each player.

Anytime during your Play Cards phase, you may play one of your Empire cards instead of playing a trait.  Empire cards have powerful abilities that affect every one of your species.

You may replace an Empire card with a new one.  Subtract the cost of the old Empire card from the cost of the a new Empire card. The new Empire card replaces the old power.

Legends of the Deep is expected to hit Kickstarter in mid-2021.

-description from publisher
